record.description: [Miss] Blanchard examines a device used by Professor Albert A. Michelson to measure the speed of light. The University of Chicago's world famous scientific instruments are on display in the Mandel Bros. exhibition room as part of the celebration of the store's seventy-fifth anniversary.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Parts of the surface are covered with thick black paint. Newspaper clipping attached to the back. Stamp: date received.
